fields.name: columnHeight
javadoc: The text used to identify the height of a layer

fields.name: columnType
javadoc: The text used to identify the material for a layer

methods.name: hasValidSelection
javadoc: Returns whether there is a valid layer selection

methods.name: updateButtonValidity
javadoc: Would update whether or not the edit and remove buttons are enabled, but is currently disabled and always disables the buttons (which are invisible anyways)
